title: Chottootona No Naishobanashi
alternative_title: Be Our Guest ; Azuma Yuki Tanpenshuu - Chotto Otona no Naishobanashi ; あずまゆき短編集 ちょっとオトナのないしょ話 ; ビー アワー ゲスト ; 星姬村秘闻
status: Be Our Guest ; Azuma Yuki Tanpenshuu - Chotto Otona no Naishobanashi ; あずまゆき短編集 ちょっとオトナのないしょ話 ; ビー アワー ゲスト ; 星姬村秘闻
description:
Description :
        1. Chapters 1-4, a sequel to Hoshihimemura no Naishobanashi. Two first chapters were previously published in Manga Cross in 2018 before entering a hiatus and the rest are compiled into this collection.

2. Extra chapter of Hoshihimemura no Naishobanashi, originally published in Young Champion Retsu in 2018.

3. Chapters 1-2 of Be Our Guest.
